snippet: The On the Run blog will devote a post to each of the 26 miles of the New York City Marathon — the neighborhoods, the landmarks, the views and your memories. It all begins at the Verrazano-Narrows Bridge in Staten Island.
abstract: The On the Run blog will devote a post to each of the 26 miles of the New York City Marathon — the neighborhoods, the landmarks, the views and your memories. It all begins at the Verrazano-Narrows Bridge in Staten Island.

headline.main: Mile by Mile: Where the Marathon Begins
